name: majdal.github.com
body:
### oh, hai!!

I'm Majd Al-Shihabi. I'm Majd Al-Shihabi. I enjoy synthesizing ideas and drawing connections that open up possibilities, finding overlaps between virtual and physical worlds. I design, I program, and I learn, and I redesign. [Here's](http://www.majdal.me/projects/) a sample of my work.
